# contactField

**Instance Property**

The field name that contains the error on the payment sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute ApplePayErrorContactField contactField;
```

## Discussion

The payment sheet highlights the field corresponding to the value of this attribute.

For the possible field values, see [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayErrorContactField].

## Error Properties

- **code**: The error code for this instance.
- **message**: A localized, user-facing string that describes the error.
